comment:
Unfair grading standards 

Allowed some very inappropriate behavior by group members 

Disappointing

Professor Whitney is very passionate about his teaching and does well to engage students. The tests are straight forward and pulled from the lectures and textbook. Very easy to get in contact with and always strives to ensure his students succeed.

I thoroughly enjoyed this professor's engaging lecture style, which incorporated small activities and participation to keep things interesting. The course involved two lockdown browser exams (no webcam) and three concise, two-page papers. His feedback was consistently valuable

MGT 7050 MBA. Their passion for the subject makes class participation engaging. They are care, understanding, and create a supportive learning environment. The course includes a group project and about 2-3 individual papers (2pgs long max). Exams are lockdown browser, no camera. Overall, a highly effective and enriching experience.

attendance required w a participation assignment in each class. lecture involves a lot of class participation. weekly homework includes smartbook assignments and discussion posts. exams are lockdown no camera, not too difficult. semester-long group project, but he gives you class time to work on it, which takes some stress off. very caring prof.
